name: Mango Basil Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail with the tropical essence of mango, the herbal touch of basil, and a kick of lime, all muddled and mixed with white rum. Sip and savor the flavors of summer.

name: Pomegranate Walnut Wine Spritzer
description: A sophisticated wine spritzer featuring the rich taste of pomegranate, the crunch of walnuts, and the effervescence of your favorite white wine. An elegant drink for any occasion.

name: Crisp Apple Ginger Beer
description: A non-alcoholic delight with the crispness of apple, the warmth of ginger, and the effervescence of ginger beer. A refreshing beverage for those who prefer a zesty kick without the alcohol.

name: Blueberry Rosemary Soda Splash
description: A bubbly soda splash infused with the sweet burst of blueberries and the aromatic touch of rosemary. A non-alcoholic thirst quencher perfect for hot summer days.

name: Honey Cucumber Gin Fizz
description: A gin fizz cocktail with a twist – honey-infused sweetness, refreshing cucumber slices, and a hint of thyme. This effervescent drink is a delightful blend of flavors.

name: Cranberry Sage Vodka Sparkler
description: A sparkling cocktail featuring the tartness of cranberries, the herbal notes of sage, and a splash of vodka. This effervescent drink is perfect for festive celebrations.

name: Spicy Mango Michelada
description: A bold and spicy beer cocktail with the tropical kick of mango, a hint of chili flakes, and a touch of lime. This refreshing Michelada is perfect for those who love a bit of heat.

name: Pomegranate Mint Lemonade
description: A non-alcoholic lemonade infused with the sweet-tart flavor of pomegranate, the freshness of mint, and a squeeze of lemon. This cooling drink is a summer favorite.

name: Walnut Honey Tea Elixir
description: A soothing elixir featuring the rich essence of walnuts, the sweetness of honey, and the warmth of herbal tea. This non-alcoholic drink is perfect for relaxation.

name: Rosemary Cucumber Gin Tonic
description: A classic gin and tonic elevated with the herbal infusion of rosemary and the crispness of cucumber. This refreshing cocktail is a sophisticated choice for any occasion.

name: Apricot Rosemary Rosé
description: A delightful rosé wine with the sweet aroma of apricots and a touch of herbal freshness from rosemary. Sip and savor the delicate notes of this elegant wine.

name: Cranberry Apple Cider Sangria
description: A fruity and vibrant sangria with red wine, featuring the flavors of cranberries, apples, and a hint of cinnamon. This autumn-inspired wine is perfect for gatherings.

name: Pomegranate Blueberry Merlot
description: A rich Merlot infused with the bold flavors of pomegranate and blueberries. This full-bodied red wine offers a luscious and fruity experience.

name: Honey Walnut Chardonnay
description: An elegant Chardonnay with a touch of sweetness from honey and a nutty depth from walnuts. Sip and enjoy the harmonious blend of flavors in this white wine.

name: Mango Basil Sauvignon Blanc
description: A crisp Sauvignon Blanc with the tropical essence of mango and the herbal notes of basil. This white wine offers a refreshing and aromatic experience.
